title: Mastering TypeScript
author: John Doe
description: A comprehensive guide to TypeScript for modern web development. Learn advanced types, generics, decorators, and best practices for building scalable applications.

title: React Patterns & Best Practices
author: Jane Smith
description: Discover proven patterns and best practices for building maintainable React applications. Includes hooks, context, performance optimization, and testing strategies.

title: Next.js Complete Guide
author: Michael Johnson
description: Master Next.js 14 with App Router, Server Components, Server Actions, and advanced deployment strategies. Build production-ready full-stack applications.

title: Tailwind CSS in Practice
author: Sarah Williams
description: Learn utility-first CSS with Tailwind. Build beautiful, responsive interfaces quickly with practical examples and real-world projects.

title: Building APIs with Node.js
author: David Brown
description: Design and build robust RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express. Covers authentication, validation, database integration, and API security.

title: JavaScript Design Patterns
author: Emily Davis
description: Explore classic and modern design patterns in JavaScript. Learn when and how to apply patterns for cleaner, more maintainable code.
